result.arabic_text: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ أَمَتَّنَا ٱثۡنَتَيۡنِ وَأَحۡيَيۡتَنَا ٱثۡنَتَيۡنِ فَٱعۡتَرَفۡنَا بِذُنُوبِنَا فَهَلۡ إِلَىٰ خُرُوجٖ مِّن سَبِيلٖ
result.translation: 11. Koros itteh; ni Rabbow namma adda nee qiddeeh namma adda nee tuynuwweeh ninni dambi neelemehik (nekeelehik) tokkel girák elle nawqeeh, addunyâ fan nee elle gacissa giti (gurri) maay yan? Meqe taamá taamitnam keh (aleey mayan).
